game

Class Alien

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • game.Alien
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Alien
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Alien class holds information for each alien object, controls their location and movement, and determines size and image.
    Author:
    JustinDowty, Ted Lang, Alec Allain
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Paints alien to screen based on location. Also paints health bar next to alien based on current health.
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
        Parameters:
        g - Instance of graphics.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the alien's position and speed.

      • update

        public void update(int currTime)
        Updates alien's position, resetting if past the bottom of screen and it is time for a new meteor to spawn.
        Parameters:
        currTime - Uses current time in game to determine when resetting blast is appropriate.
